org.omnaest.utils.table
Interface TablePersistence<E>

Type Parameters:
E -
All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleDirectoryBasedTablePersistenceUsingJAXB, SimpleDirectoryBasedTablePersistenceUsingSerializable, SimpleDirectoryBasedTablePersistenceUsingXStream, SimpleFileBasedTablePersistence
public interface TablePersistence<E>
extends Serializable

A TablePersistence handles the change events from a Table and persists any modified, added or removed data

setColumnTitles(String[]) and setTableName(String) are called before any attempt to access the TablePersistence, so this methods are useful to synchronize the meta data

Author:
Omnaest
